toolPhD 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

wrapper for correlation calculation

Source: R/cor_df.R
cor_df.Rd

cor_df calculate correlation matrix/stripe for each complete pairs.

cor_df(dat, tar = NULL, method = "pearson")

Arguments

dat

a dataframe, include *only* numeric columns for correlation
tar

a dataframe, include *only* numeric columns for correlation
metohd

default is NULL

Value

a list of three elements: 1. `r.mat`r matrix, 2.`p.mat` p-value matrix

Author

Tien-Cheng Wang

Examples

# numeric dataframe
cor_df(mtcars)

#> using pearson correlation of coefficient
#> [[1]]
#>             mpg        cyl       disp         hp        drat         wt
#> mpg   1.0000000 -0.8521620 -0.8475514 -0.7761684  0.68117191 -0.8676594
#> cyl  -0.8521620  1.0000000  0.9020329  0.8324475 -0.69993811  0.7824958

#> Error: 'signif' is not an exported object from 'namespace:toolPhD'

# dataframe contains character
cor_df(iris)

#> Error in cor_df(iris): data contains factor columns
cor_df(iris[,-5])

#> using pearson correlation of coefficient
#> [[1]]
#>              Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width
#> Sepal.Length    1.0000000  -0.1175698    0.8717538   0.8179411
#> Sepal.Width    -0.1175698   1.0000000   -0.4284401  -0.3661259
#> Petal.Length    0.8717538  -0.4284401    1.0000000   0.9628654
#> Petal.Width     0.8179411  -0.3661259    0.9628654   1.0000000
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>              Sepal.Length  Sepal.Width Petal.Length  Petal.Width
#> Sepal.Length 0.000000e+00 1.518983e-01 1.038667e-47 2.325498e-37
#> Sepal.Width  1.518983e-01 0.000000e+00 4.513314e-08 4.073229e-06
#> Petal.Length 1.038667e-47 4.513314e-08 0.000000e+00 4.675004e-86
#> Petal.Width  2.325498e-37 4.073229e-06 4.675004e-86 0.000000e+00
#> 
cor_df(iris[,-5], method='sma')

#> using sma correlation of coefficient
#> [[1]]
#>              Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width
#> Sepal.Length    1.0000000  -0.1175698    0.8717538   0.8179411
#> Sepal.Width    -0.1175698   1.0000000   -0.4284401  -0.3661259
#> Petal.Length    0.8717538  -0.4284401    1.0000000   0.9628654
#> Petal.Width     0.8179411  -0.3661259    0.9628654   1.0000000
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>              Sepal.Length  Sepal.Width Petal.Length  Petal.Width
#> Sepal.Length 0.000000e+00 1.518983e-01 1.038667e-47 2.325498e-37
#> Sepal.Width  1.518983e-01 0.000000e+00 4.513314e-08 4.073229e-06
#> Petal.Length 1.038667e-47 4.513314e-08 0.000000e+00 4.675004e-86
#> Petal.Width  2.325498e-37 4.073229e-06 4.675004e-86 0.000000e+00
#> 
cor_df(iris[,-5],'Sepal.Length' ,method='sma')
